primaryMissions.name: PURGE THE FOE
primaryMissions.description: Exterminate the enemy. Each player scores 4VP if one or more enemy units were destroyed. From round 2: 4VP if more enemy units than friendly were destroyed. Also score 4VP for controlling objectives (8VP if more than opponent).
primaryMissions.details: ANY BATTLE ROUND: End of round, score 4VP for destroyed units. SECOND BATTLE ROUND+: Score 4VP for efficiency and 4-8VP for objectives.

primaryMissions.name: LINCHPIN
primaryMissions.description: True victory is built upon a firm foundation. Control the centre or hold your deployment zone.
primaryMissions.details: SECOND BATTLE ROUND+: 3VP for each objective if DZ marker is NOT controlled. 3VP for DZ + 5VP for each other marker if DZ IS controlled (max 15VP).

primaryMissions.name: SCORCHED EARTH
primaryMissions.description: What cannot be secured must be burned to ash. Action: Burn Objective (Shooting phase, Round 2+).
primaryMissions.details: 5VP for burning in No Man's Land, 10VP in Opponent's DZ. 5VP per controlled objective (max 10VP).

primaryMissions.name: UNEXPLODED ORDNANCE
primaryMissions.description: Move Hazard objective markers towards enemy territory. Action: Move Hazard (Shooting phase).
primaryMissions.details: Score 8VP/5VP/2VP based on how deep the Hazard marker is in the opponent's territory.

primaryMissions.name: SUPPLY DROP
primaryMissions.description: Supplies inbound. Alpha removed Round 4, all others Round 5 except Omega.

primaryMissions.name: TERRAFORM
primaryMissions.description: Dominate the landscape. Action: Terraform (Shooting phase, Round 2+).
primaryMissions.details: 4VP for each objective controlled + 2VP for each terraformed marker (max 15VP).

primaryMissions.name: BURDEN OF TRUST
primaryMissions.description: Guard the strategic prizes. Units can be assigned to guard objectives.
primaryMissions.details: 4VP for objectives outside DZ. Opponent scores 2VP for units guarding objectives.

primaryMissions.name: TAKE AND HOLD
primaryMissions.description: Secure identified strategic locations and hold them at any cost.
primaryMissions.details: SECOND BATTLE ROUND+: 5VP for each objective marker controlled (up to 15VP).

primaryMissions.name: THE RITUAL
primaryMissions.description: Race to finish a ritual. Action: The Ritual (Shooting phase) to set up new markers.
primaryMissions.details: SECOND BATTLE ROUND+: 5VP for each objective in No Man's Land (up to 15VP).

secondaryMissions.name: ASSASSINATION
secondaryMissions.goal: Identify and eliminate enemy champions. Score when CHARACTER models are destroyed.
secondaryMissions.vp: Fixed: 4VP per character. Tactical: 5VP if 1+ destroyed this turn (or all destroyed during battle).

secondaryMissions.name: BEHIND ENEMY LINES
secondaryMissions.goal: Break through and reach opponent's deployment zone. (Exclude AIRCRAFT/Battle-shocked).
secondaryMissions.vp: 1 unit in enemy DZ: 3VP. 2+ units in enemy DZ: 4VP.

secondaryMissions.name: BRING IT DOWN
secondaryMissions.goal: Destroy enemy MONSTER or VEHICLE units.
secondaryMissions.vp: 2VP per unit + extra VP for high Wounds (15+ Wounds: +2VP, 20+ Wounds: +4VP total).

secondaryMissions.name: STORM HOSTILE OBJECTIVE
secondaryMissions.goal: Control objective markers that were held by the opponent at the start of the turn.
secondaryMissions.vp: 4VP if you capture a hostile objective marker.

secondaryMissions.name: CULL THE HORDE
secondaryMissions.goal: Destroy high-model-count or high-wound INFANTRY units.
secondaryMissions.vp: 5VP per unit destroyed (Starting Strength 20+, 25+ Wounds, or 20+ points cost models).

secondaryMissions.name: RECOVER ASSETS
secondaryMissions.goal: ACTION: Shooting phase. Units in DZ, No Man's Land, or Enemy DZ recover assets.

secondaryMissions.name: AREA DENIAL
secondaryMissions.goal: Dominate the centre of the battlefield. No enemy units allowed within range.
secondaryMissions.vp: Unit within 3" of centre: 2VP. Unit within 3" and NO enemies within 6": 5VP.

secondaryMissions.name: SECURE NO MAN’S LAND
secondaryMissions.goal: Advance and seize objectives in No Man’s Land.

secondaryMissions.name: CONTAINMENT
secondaryMissions.goal: ACTION: Shooting phase. Units within 9" of battlefield edges (not in your DZ).

secondaryMissions.name: MARKED FOR DEATH
secondaryMissions.goal: Opponent selects 3 units. Destroy the selected units.
secondaryMissions.vp: 5VP if one or more selected units were destroyed this turn.

secondaryMissions.name: DEFEND STRONGHOLD
secondaryMissions.goal: Control one or more objective markers in your deployment zone (Round 2 onwards).

secondaryMissions.name: SABOTAGE
secondaryMissions.goal: ACTION: Shooting phase. Unit within terrain (not in your DZ).
secondaryMissions.vp: Commit sabotage: 3VP. Commit sabotage in enemy DZ: 6VP.

secondaryMissions.name: OVERWHELMING FORCE
secondaryMissions.goal: Destroy enemy units that started the turn within range of an objective marker.

secondaryMissions.name: EXTEND BATTLE LINES
secondaryMissions.goal: Control objectives in your DZ AND No Man's Land.
secondaryMissions.vp: Control both: 5VP. Only 1 unit on field controlling No Man's Land: 2VP.

secondaryMissions.name: ENGAGE ON ALL FRONTS
secondaryMissions.goal: Units in different table quarters (6" away from centre).

secondaryMissions.name: ESTABLISH LOCUS
secondaryMissions.goal: ACTION: Shooting phase. Set up locus in centre or enemy DZ.

secondaryMissions.name: CLEANSE
secondaryMissions.goal: ACTION: Shooting phase. Cleanse objective markers not in your DZ.
